solution_line_template: There have been {total_puzzles} puzzles because {num_books} x {puzzles_per_book} = <<{total_puzzles}={total_puzzles}>>{total_puzzles}
It would take {total_minutes} minutes to find all the Waldo's because {total_puzzles} x {minutes_per_puzzle} = <<{total_puzzles}*{minutes_per_puzzle}={total_minutes}>>{total_minutes}
